meaningMnemonic: When you see both a <radical>rice paddy</radical> and a <radical>street</radical> in the same place, you have the makings of a whole <kanji>town</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: You go to visit this nice little <kanji>town</kanji>. But then, there she is... Every time you walk down the street, the street-woman Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) arrives to ruin your day.
